item.description:
Castleton Halloween Dance Party!!!

Friday Oct. 28th. 8 pm. to 1 am.

The Castleton

rt 111 & rt 93, exit 3

Windham NH.

http://www.togethernh.com/singlesevents.html

cash bar, and they serve or'dureves.

Cost: $12 before 9.. Then it goes up $15..

Costumes optional. No costume prizes.

Host: Steve Obermiller 603-491-1962 ob@tds.net

      This is the largest Halloween Dance Party in NH.. So, Lets all go out, and celebrate Halloween. There will be between 300 to 400 attending, with the best verity of ages and people anywhere, and most will be in costume. Even tho there was no costume prize to win.  So get out your costumes and have a some fun, (costumes are optional:),,Dancing to great tunes of the DJ. The past years, we have up 65 at our tables. They all had a blast. I heard last year, a group went out for breakfast afterwards.

    Because of the popularity of this Dance. Please get there as close to 8 pm. as possible. Tables and chairs will be hard to hold on to much past 9. Plus, the cover charge goes up to $15.. Also, If you would like to be introduced to around 35 45 people? Get there early. As it gets later, introductions become difficult.

P.S.: while at the last Castleton dance they asked for feed back wanting to know if any one is in favor of a New Years Party, if so contact them at togethernh@msn.com We can all wear what we want on this night,,yahoo no dress code!!!
item.how_to_find_us: Ask for Steve O. or Meetup at the door as you pay.
item.name: Castleton Halloween Dance Party!!!
